ncrsGatheringSites.abcd:Locality: Sea of Azov; just S of Genichesk
ncrsGatheringSites.abcd:LocalityText: Ukraine, Sea of Azov, just S of Genichesk; 10.vi.1993; caught with shrimpnet; depth ca. 1 m; sandy bottom; with Palaemon adspersus, Rhithropanopeus harrissii tridentatus, Idotea balthica and Sphaeroma pulchellum; G. Keijl leg. et don.
